items.text: length on middle and leg, whipped to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, 1 run

items.text: slower length ball angling into middle, defended with soft hands.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: cutter that he lands short of length on off, punched to point.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: squirts this to gully, there's a misfield but they don't take the run
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, defended from the crease to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: slapped wide of mid-off, flat-batted. Superb. Just backed away and belted this away
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, FOUR runs

items.text: wild heave across the line, beaten.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: stands tall and bunts this back towards the bowler.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: angles in a length delivery on middle and off, turns this into the leg side.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: punches this into the gap at extra cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: reaches out to slap this over point, but misses.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, no run

items.text: ducks under this short ball outside off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, no run

items.text: works this from outside off towards square leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, no run

items.text: chipped wide of cover, down to wide long-off for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, 1 run

items.text: flat-bats this short delivery past mid-on. Ferocious hit. It was too short, deserved to be punished.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, FOUR runs

items.text: angling away, looks to slash but misses. Umpire deems this to be too far wide outside off.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, 1 wide

items.text: shows the full face of the bat and defends.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, pushed to cover.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: slower and angling across on a length outside off, punched to deep cover.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, 1 run

items.text: full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williams, 1 run

items.text: wild swing and a miss to a length ball angling away
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: full and angling into the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: has he feathered this? Not quite. Banged in short, looked to fetch the pull from outside off, beaten.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, no run

items.text: right behind the line as he punches back.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, no run

items.text: sees this in his half and belts this down the ground to bisect long-off and long-on.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Jarvis, FOUR runs
